tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE greenhouse_data (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	sensor_id INT,
	temperature FLOAT,
	humidity FLOAT,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE GreenhouseDevices (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  current_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE TemperatureData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  temperature_value FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE HumidityData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  humidity_value FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  alert_type VARCHAR(50),
  message TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE greenhouse ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    device_id INT, 
    temperature FLOAT, 
    humidity FLOAT, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE alert ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    device_id INT, 
    alert_type VARCHAR(50), 
    message TEXT, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP 
);
